meanings.sent1: The heavy rain outwashes the dirt from the sidewalk.
meanings.sent2: She outwashes the stains from the clothes with soap and water.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy outwashes the sand from its paws all over the house.
meanings.sent4: The river outwashes the rocks, revealing their colorful layers underneath.
meanings.sent5: The powerful wave outwashes everything in its path, leaving a clean slate behind.

meanings.definition: The act of washing out or away
meanings.sent1: After the storm, there were visible outwashes on the road.
meanings.sent2: The outwashes from the river carried debris downstream.
meanings.sent3: The outwashes from the washing machine flooded the laundry room.
meanings.sent4: The outwashes of paint on the canvas created a beautiful blend of colors.
meanings.sent5: The outwashes of the ocean foam left intricate patterns on the sandy beach.
